level.heading: Application.
level.text: ยง 20-310 Application. a. Application for such license shall be in writing and shall be executed by the applicant under oath. b. Such application shall contain: 1. Type of sale to be conducted and reason for conducting such sale; 2. A description of the place where such sale is to be held; 3. The nature of the occupancy, whether by lease or sub-lease, and the date of termination of such occupancy; 4. The means to be employed in publishing such sale, together with the text of any and all proposed advertising matter; 5. An itemized list of the goods, wares and merchandise to be offered for sale; 6. Where and from whom such stock was purchased or acquired; and, if not purchased, the manner of such acquisition. 7. Any additional information as the commissioner may require.
